title: Put This On Episode 7: Personal Style
body: Episode seven of Put This On explores personal style – elegant, quirky, distinctive and everywhere in between.Field correspondentDave Hillvisits the annual meeting ofthe Corduroy Appreciation Club, held each year on 11/11, the date which most resembles corduroy. He discovers a magical world,dedicated to the promotion of that most bookish of fabrics, and to the denigration of the sworn enemy of the wale: velvet.ThenRoxana Altamiranobrings a new Nerd Boyfriend segment, with an investigation of an icon of eccentric style, Andre Benjamin, aka Andre 3000 of Outkast.Plus: a conversation with one of the world’s most elegant men, Gay Talese. He’s not just one of America’s most celebrated magazine writers and the man whoinvented the contemporary magazine profile. He’s also one of the best-dressed men in the world, the son of an immigrant tailor who imbued in his progeny a love of fine clothing. Besides that, he’s gothis own lapel shape!Stay tuned to putthison.com for more information about season two.
